settlements.settlement_name: Nations Direct Mortgage - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Private information was compromised in the December 2023 Nations Direct Mortgage data breach

settlements.settlement_name: Oklahoma Spine Hospital - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Received a notice stating that your personal information was exposed in a July 2024 Oklahoma Spine Hospital data breach

settlements.settlement_name: Restek Corporation - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Personal information was exposed in the June 2023 Restek Corporation data breach

settlements.settlement_name: Behavioral Health Resources - Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Received notice of the November 2024 Behavioral Health Resources data breach

settlements.settlement_name: Papaya Gaming - Bots Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Had a Papaya Gaming account and made a deposit in one or more Papaya games between January 1, 2019 and September 5, 2024

settlements.settlement_name: Mid America Pet Food - Salmonella Contamination Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Bought certain pet foods produced by Mid America Pet Food between October 31, 2022 and February 29, 2024

settlements.settlement_name: Joybird, La-Z-Boy Deceptive Discounts Class Action Settlement
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Purchased Joybird or La-Z-Boy products with allegedly deceptive discounts
Were a 23andMe customer between May 1, 2023 and October 1, 2023 and received notice that your personal information was compromised in a data breach

settlements.settlement_name: Nelnet Data Breach Class Action Settlement
Alabama Cardiovascular Group Data Breach Class Action Settlement
settlements.dollar_amount_per_claimant: Up to $5,000 for documented losses or a pro rata cash payment, plus two years of credit monitoring
settlements.eligibility_requirements: Affected by Alabama Cardiovascular Group data breach
